description:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10014803

Available now for the first time in the west, Milano's Odd Job Collection brings its retro charm and unique mini-games to modern consoles with numerous quality-of-life improvements and gorgeous pixel art graphics. Start your summer vacation today, and deliver pizzas, milk flying cows, customize your home, and more in this wholesome classic.

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/super-animal-royale/

The Super Animal World expansion for Super Animal Royale is now available for free! Explore a new persistent Social Hub, where you can relax, meet NPCs, embark on quests, and enjoy cozy activities like fishing, bug catching, and hamsterball racing, between brutal fights to the death.

Join your super friends in a living social world, where you can explore, unwind, and matchmake straight from the Social Hub into competitive modes, including Animal Royale, The Bwoking Dead (infection mode), and SAW vs Rebellion (control point mode). After each match, return to the Hub to continue the Circle of Super Life.

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games #superanimalroyale
title: Super Animal Royale - Super Animal World Launch Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/games/avatar-frontiers-of-pandora/

Experience the ultimate Pandora adventure in the Western Frontier. Play as So'lek, a warrior Na'vi fighting against the RDA and the ruthless Ash Clan to save his family.

Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora - From the Ashes, coming December 19, 2025. 

Pre-order now and get the Floating Mountains bonus content, including three different color patterns to customize your banshee and immerse yourself further in the Western Frontier.

#ps5 #ps5games #avatarfrontiers
title: Avatar: Frontiers of Pandora - From the Ashes Launch Trailer | PS5 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
Franchise Mode is Now Available in Maximum Football! With this pro football mode also comes Maximum Football to PlayStation 4. 

Forge your legacy in Maximum Football, where you can play both college and pro football in one shared universe. Recruit the next college superstar and take them into the pros to become a future Hall of Famer. Build your team with unparalleled in-game customization that gives you ultimate control. 

Play Maximum Football for free on PlayStation 5 and PlayStation 4.
title: Maximum Football - Franchise Mode Launch Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10010621

Showgunners, a turn-based tactical combat game, launches on February 19, 2026 on PlayStation 5 and PlayStation 4. 

In a dystopian future where corporations rule, a brutal reality show is the hottest entertainment property in town! Step into the role of Scarlett as you battle through deadly urban arenas filled with lethal traps, twisted puzzles, and hordes of heavily armed psychopaths. Fight for survival — and for revenge.

Pre-order now to get the Showgunners Platinum Edition for the price of the Standard Edition — and receive the PlayStation-exclusive Cyber Runner costume!

Includes:
● Showgunners – Standard Edition
● Neon Justice DLC – a striking costume for Scarlett, exclusive to the Platinum Edition
● Costumes & Weapons Pack DLC – 3 unique costumes and 2 weapon reskins for Scarlett
● Cyber Runner DLC – a futuristic costume for Scarlett, exclusive to PlayStation pre-orders

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games #showgunners 

Rated Mature
title: Showgunners - Announcement Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://www.playstation.com/en-us/games/minecraft/ 

Mounts of Mayhem charges into Minecraft today! Face down undead foes in frenzied mounted combat during the day, at night, and even deep underwater. Fight back with the spear – a new tiered weapon which deals damage based on your precision and the speed of your trusted steed. Riders of the Overworld – mount up and lead the charge! The Mounts of Mayhem drop is out now in Minecraft! 

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4 #ps4games #minecraft
title: Minecraft - Mounts of Mayhem Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

author: PlayStation
description:
https://store.playstation.com/concept/10012469

The past and the future collide in Terminator 2D: NO FATE, an officially licensed 2D side-scroller bringing classic arcade action to PlayStation 4 (PS4) and PlayStation 5 (PS5) on December 12th, 2025.

Play as Sarah Connor and the T-800 through a variety of thrilling missions as they take on the T-1000 and try to put a stop to Skynet’s plans before the human race is annihilated. Lead the Resistance as John Connor in the future, fighting on the front lines as mankind’s only hope in the War Against the Machines.

In this unique story blending iconic scenes from ‘Terminator 2: Judgment Day’ with original scenarios and multiple endings, humanity’s fate is yours to decide

© 2025 Reef Entertainment Ltd. All rights reserved. Published by Reef Entertainment Ltd. Developed by Bitmap Bureau Ltd.

Terminator 2: Judgment Day, T2, THE TERMINATOR, ENDOSKELETON, and any depiction of Endoskeleton are trademarks of STUDIOCANAL S.A.S. All Rights Reserved
title: Terminator 2D: No Fate - Launch Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games

Crossplay is now available! Play with anyone on any platform with crossplay and Friend’s Pass today.

LEGO® Voyagers is out now on PlayStation 4/5.

From the makers of LEGO® Builder's Journey comes a new 2-player co-op adventure about friendship and play. When two friends make it their mission to rescue an abandoned spaceship, they embark on a journey beyond their wildest dreams, ultimately learning the value of being connected.
